main event: A strange oblong or cigar-shaped object, approximately the size of a rolled up Time magazine, was observed over Wilkes Barre, PA on November 24, 1958.
interesting points: The object changed colors from reddish-orange to white, and appeared to have smoke coming out of the top.
The object was stationary, and an aircraft flew into it and was obscured by the overcast.
The object was observed for 5 to 10 seconds at an angle of 25 to 30 degrees above the horizon.
Binoculars were used to observe the object, but the magnification power was unknown.
Some observers on the aircraft believed the object was a cloud formation.
sighted object: An oblong or cigar-shaped object, approximately the size of a rolled up Time magazine
